title: Necromantica
description: A haunted forest. A killer on the run. So begins a love story. So begins the apocalypse.In this heart-stopping, dark fantasy, two thieves charge through an epic battle between monsters and men. One, a necromancer, a sorceress who uses black magic to manipulate the dead. The other, a rogue assassin and skilled swordsman. Enemies to both armies, allied only to each other, they face doom at every moment on a suicide mission to steal from a holy king.
author: Keith Blenman
